attributes.action: to dig subways where there are knowncongestion spots caused due to pedestrian crossings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i propose that subways should be dug where there are known congestion areas due to pedestrian crossings.
this has three benefetits.
1) the pedestrian is safer
2) congestion is eased
3) it helps the environment, as 1st and 2nd gear used by drivers will be used more sparingly.
a plus side for everyone.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
